name: appcreation-gamification-core
description: Prevent duplicate point systems and enforce shared gamification patterns (events/profiles/streaks/challenges/analytics) across apps.
---

# APP CREATION — Gamification Core Skill (No Duplicate Points)

## Rule
No isolated points/XP systems. Prefer shared event-driven patterns (game_events + analytics_events).

## Output
- Where duplication exists (paths)
- Minimal migration path (1–3 steps)
- Verification commands + rollback
